## gcloud.CloudRunProps interface

Props for the [gcloud.CloudRun](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrun.md) component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CloudRunProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [allowUnauthenticated](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.allowunauthenticated.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Allow public access to this service |
|  [args](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.args.md) | <code>string[]</code> | Arguments for the container entrypoint |
|  [cpu](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.cpu.md) | <code>string &#124; number</code> | CPU resources that can be consumed by this CloudRun deployment |
|  [env](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.env.md) | [<code>Environment</code>](./cloud.environment.md) | Environment for the container in the deployment |
|  [image](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.image.md) | <code>string</code> | Image from which to start the container |
|  [memory](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.memory.md) | <code>string &#124; number</code> | Memory allocated to this deployment |
|  [port](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.port.md) | <code>number</code> | Port on which the container will listen |
|  [region](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.region.md) | <code>string</code> | Region in which to create the cloud run deployment |
|  [serviceName](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.servicename.md) | <code>string</code> | Name of the Cloud Run service in gcloud |
|  [trafficPct](./cloud.gcloud.cloudrunprops.trafficpct.md) | <code>number</code> | Percentage of traffic for the latest revision of the deployment |
